message: Hello Bob, I'm offering this product to you for $14,000. I believe it will be highly beneficial to you.
Thanks for the offer Alice, but I'm looking to pay a bit less. How about $12,000? I'm sure we can find a price that works for both of us.
I appreciate your offer, Bob.  How about we meet in the middle at $13,000? I'm confident this product will exceed your expectations and provide significant value.
